string-array.name: schema
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE GAME(ID LONG PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, author TEXT NOT NULL, modified DATE not null, status INT DEFAULT 1)
CREATE TABLE COMMENT(ID LONG PRIMARY KEY, entityID LONG NOT NULL, message TEXT NOT NULL, author TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE FAVORITE(type TEXT NOT NULL, entityID LONG NOT NULL, status INT DEFAULT 1)
